message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this valuable product for $18000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $18000 is beyond my budget. I can offer $8000 for the product. Let me know if we can work something out.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $8000 is significantly below its value.  How about we meet in the middle at $13000?
